name: Absurd Chess
description:
Absurd Chess will introduce you to a set of completely absurd chess rules and variants you've never played before!


- Play with friends or alone against up to 100 other players
- Explore multiple modes and find your favourite
- Adapt to new rules and use them to your advantage

Running out of pieces ? How about buying a few more ?


Want to participate in early alpha tests and/or submit your own ideas ?
Join our discord
